ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We sent down cascading water from the clouds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We sent down rain from water-laden clouds pouring in torrents
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and sent down abundant water from the clouds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and sent down heavy rains from the clouds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And then sent down hard rain from the water bearing clouds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have sent down from the Mu`sirat water Thajjaj.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We send down from the clouds water pouring forth abundantly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and have sent down out of the rainclouds water cascading
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And have sent down from the rainy clouds abundant water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: >From the rain clouds We send waters pouring down in abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have sent down from the rain-clouds water plenteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and send down water pouring from the rain-clouds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And do We not send down from the clouds water in abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And have sent down from the rainy clouds abundant water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and have sent down from the clouds, pouring rain
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And brought down from the clouds pouring water?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:14] and sent down from the rain-clouds (mu‘sirāt), the clouds due to give rain (similar to [the term] mu‘sir, which denotes a girl nearing menstruation) cascading water?, pouring forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And have sent down from the rainy clouds abundant Water,
